results.title: In an Ancient Greek Port, a New Cultural Hub
results.abstract: The city of Piraeus, just outside Athens, is becoming a haven for galleries and design studios attracted by its abundant warehouses and growing creative community.

multimedia.caption: The facade of Piraeus’s Rodeo Gallery. Its founder, Sylvia Kouvali, took over this historic warehouse in 2018 and asked the Berlin architect Etienne Descloux to add a modern intervention — a hallway and offices — in the center.

results.title: Unraveling the Mysteries Hidden in Vast Glacier Caves
results.abstract: A group of scientists and adventure athletes are venturing into icy labyrinths to study their relationships with glacial melting and climate change.

multimedia.caption: During the summer, moulins are filled with raging waterfalls. Fall’s cooler temperatures shut off surface melting and allow a brief window for glacier cave exploration before moulins become plugged with winter’s drifting snow. Here, Will Gadd finishes climbing out of a moulin during the Red Bull Beneath the Ice expedition to explore and study Greenland’s glacier caves.

During the summer, moulins are filled with raging waterfalls. Fall’s cooler temperatures shut off surface melting and allow a brief window for glacier cave exploration before moulins become plugged with winter’s drifting snow. results.title: Amid cries of tyranny, Britain cancels any plan to require vaccine passports.
results.abstract: Prime Minister Boris Johnson is expected to discuss the decision on Tuesday, and also to address the likelihood of Covid booster shots soon amid “renewed challenges” to come this winter.

Soccer fans showed their Covid vaccination cards to a security officer at a soccer match in London on Sunday. While Britain has scrapped any immediate plans for vaccine passports, venues may still require proof of vaccination.

results.title: A New Sports Star Showcases the Diversity of a More Complex Britain
results.abstract: Emma Raducanu, 18, galvanized the nation with her triumph in the U.S. Open, drawing congratulations from royalty and inspiring pride in her hometown outside London.
results.byline: By Mark Landler and Isabella Kwai
